name: Loz
description:
Loz is an homage to arcade games - a purely aesthetic experience that requires barely any context to get in and is mostly composed of skill based gameplay to obtain the highest score.

Draw lines in the scenario to play! The ball bounces off these lines, so you can direct it where you want.

For reasons, namely many, this is so far my least developed game. But at some point I needed to go for a final push and publish it, so I could stop thinking about it. Regardless and as always, you can email me with any thoughts you wish to share.

Music by Trevor Lentz. Please go listen to his work, there's good stuff there.
